publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7761 Mr Frank McAveety: East End Community Champions—That the Parliament congratulates all of the winners of the Evening Times Community Champions awards; welcomes the senior award win for Margaret Miller, who founded the Lightburn WRVS Harmony Club in Shettleston; recognises that the club has offered help to stroke patients for more than 35 years; recognises the value that local champions bring to their area, and welcomes the celebration of these community champions who, it considers, have worked tirelessly to help the people of the east end and the whole city. Supported by: Stuart McMillan*

S3M-7761 Mr Frank McAveety: East End Community Champions—That the Parliament congratulates all of the winners of the Evening Times Community Champions awards; welcomes the senior award win for Margaret Miller, who founded the Lightburn WRVS Harmony Club in Shettleston; recognises that the club has offered help to stroke patients for more than 35 years; recognises the value that local champions bring to their area, and welcomes the celebration of these community champions who, it considers, have worked tirelessly to help the people of the east end and the whole city. Supported by: Stuart McMillan
